description:
Izumi is a world-class tennis player whose power, poise and grace make her one of the stars of Kisaragi Girls` High School.  Ryo gets to see her in action for a bit, but there are more important things on her mind at the moment, like her school interview!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vers le monticule où se tenait mon père !
お父さんが立ったマウンドへ
